UPRIGHT MUSIC

The world's first multifunctional catalog for preserving and monetizing music

MISSION

Help artists become owners of their own content,  which brings in money daily, attracts new fans and allows for creative freedom

Project
Goals

Create a unified international music catalog

Develop an innovative tracking and monitoring system for music tracks

Make the music industry more transparent and public

Help lyricists, composers, arrangers, and music video creators gain fame and make money

Give to musicians a simple and multifunctional monetization system of creativeness

Open up a unified space for music fans and enthusiasts from all over the world, where they

ALL IN
ONE PLACE

audio
database

Worldwide music catalog

Storage of compositions and their information

  • Storage of compositions and information about them
  • Digital certification
  • Collection of unique stories and materials

Scanner

Collecting and systematization for analytics

  • Detailed statistics from across the internet
  • Tracking music usage
  • Ratings and reports

Copyright register

Tools for protecting work relationships

  • Copyright fixation
  • Public contracts and agreements
  • Tracking license usage

Social network

Сommunication and publicity

  • All fans in one place
  • Promotion and audience building
  • Any necessary contacts

Monetization

Solutions for making money on your creativeness by all the ways

  • 10+ tools for earning money on your creativity
  • Ready-made bundles and solutions
  • Systematic business

In our database,
we already have
over 100 million songs

FULLSCALE
ANALYTIC

Any artist and/or their representative gain access to:

Information about platforms and public places – where and how any composition is broadcasted

Statistics for each composition – where, in what format, and how popular it is

Accuracy of fulfilling the agreements established by the contract

The AUDb’s analytic will count and calculate all the figures:

Market evaluation of the artist

Dynamics of each album and track in terms of reach and revenue

Forecasting prospects based on the dynamics (in a month, a year)

All indicators in one place!

We are developing a wide range of solutions for integrating AUDB into other services:

Counters
and metrics

ALL TYPES OF MUSIC MONETIZATION – IN ONE PLACE

WE PRIORITIZE YOUR SAFETY

AUDB is fully focused on ensuring that you can legally protect your creativeness, stage image, pseudonym, and everything related to your brand

On the platform, we have made sure that you can:

Easily and smoothly enter into contracts that are beneficial for you

BLOCKCHAIN

AUDb’s token

AUDb TEAM

KIR ULANOV

CO-FOUNDER & CMO IN AUDB & DAO OASIS

Marketing reviser, managing partner of a media network of TikTok and YouTube channels with a total of 100+ million subscribers

Created a technology for building profitable auto sales funnels (an online sales system), which is used by 100,000+ companies

Wrote the best-selling book "Customer Generator", which won Top Business Award, and which grew up a generation of marketers

Completed marketing reviews for projects including NYM, LetMeSpeak, WeWay, IguVerse, DinoWars

Solved various tasks: from attracting an audience to restructuring the launch strategy in projects like CryptoGPT (x30), PUML (x10), Amazy (x30), DegenZoo (x36), ChainGPT (x84)

AUDb roadmap

Stage 1: Launch of the mvp
0%
0%

  • Сollect a database of 100 million tracks

  • Develop and launch a system for scanning streams of online radio stations

  • Test the system (successfully tested on 50 radios within a year)

  • Develop a system for sorting scanned data by parameters

  • Develop a system for searching and collecting parameters by specific requests (for example, by contractor)

  • Launch project’s site

Stage 2: Launch of the catalog
0%
0%

  • Launch of the catalog

  • Filling the catalog

  • Linking audio fingerprints to the catalog database. Blockchain + token

  • Development of an identification system

  • Launching billing

  • Deployment of monitoring platform

Stage 3: Launch of the marketplace
0%
0%

  • Streaming platform

  • Music marketplace

  • Recommendation system + updates feed

  • Music promotion system

  • Merchandise and tickets marketplace

  • Smart targeted search for musical analogues

  • Integration with other music services for account transfer

Stage 4: Launch of the social network
0%
0%

  • Artist pages transform into communities

  • Updates feed turns into a news feed

  • Integration of banking systems + influencer cards

  • Account promotion system

  • Tokenization of creativity, NFT-crowdfunding

  • Fast smart-contracts system
